name: Batway Focus Timer - Pomodoro Productivity
description: Batway Focus Timer helps you stay productive with the Pomodoro technique. Break work into 25-minute focus sessions with automatic break reminders. Track your daily progress, build focus streaks, and boost productivity. Works completely offline with no ads or tracking. Perfect for students, remote workers, and anyone who wants to improve focus and time management.
features: Customizable Pomodoro timer with focus and break intervals
Daily productivity tracking with session completion counter
Streak tracking to build consistent focus habits
Keyboard shortcuts for efficient timer control
Five neon color themes with modern dashboard interface
Complete offline functionality with no internet required
Privacy-focused with no ads, tracking, or data collection
